user_query: I am planning a trip to Europe with my family and I need to keep track of the economic calendar for the countries we will be visiting. Please provide me with the economic calendar for the date range from October 1st to October 15th, 2023, and include the countries France, Italy, and Spain. Additionally, I would like to get suggestions for popular stocks, forex, and cryptocurrency in these countries to explore investment opportunities. Finally, could you also check the balance of my Zilliqa wallet with the address zil15lr86jwg937urdeayvtypvhy6pnp6d7p8n5z09? Your assistance would be greatly appreciated.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the economic calendar for France, Italy, and Spain from October 1st to October 15th, 2023.
Gather information on popular stocks in France, Italy, and Spain to explore investment opportunities.
Collect data on popular forex pairs related to France, Italy, and Spain for potential investment purposes.
Find suggestions for popular cryptocurrencies in France, Italy, and Spain for investment exploration.
Check the balance of the Zilliqa wallet using the provided address.
